scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with two thieves crucified on either side. Christ is shown with a crown of thorns and wounds from the crucifixion. Below, the Virgin Mary, dressed in blue, is depicted in grief, supported by other mourners. To the right, a figure on horseback, possibly a soldier or dignitary, observes the scene, accompanied by other figures. In the background, a city with spires and towers is visible. At the foot of the cross, a skull and bones are depicted, symbolizing Golgotha, the place of the skull.
